example.text: The Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) has carried out plots targeting citizens worldwide. My colleagues and I are calling on the United Kingdom, Australia, India, and Canada to designate the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) as a terrorist organization. (1/2)

Both Republicans and Democrats need to come to the table and enact bipartisan, comprehensive immigration reform. We can protect Dreamers and solve workforce challenges, while also strengthening our nation’s border security. (3/3)

My colleagues and I sent a letter to US Trade Representative Katherine Tai and the USDA to ensure fair, equal market access to US blueberry producers. Doing so will allow them to compete and revitalize market opportunities for producers. Read the full letter?? [[url]]
President Putin is a war criminal. I am proud that he has sanctioned me and many of my colleagues for our support of Ukraine and for standing up for their democracy.

Proud to join [[user]] and my colleagues in reintroducing the EATS Act. This legislation eliminates barriers and expands SNAP eligibility for college students, so they get the nutrition need to be successful. [[url]]
Designating the IRGC will send the clear message to Iran that acts of terrorism will not be tolerated. (2/2) [[url]]

Proud to join [[user]] and my colleagues in reintroducing the EATS Act. This legislation eliminates barriers and expands SNAP eligibility for college students, so they get the nutrition need to be successful. [[url]]
